attributes.action: Petion to get the Home Secretary to enforce the law in Northern Ireland and get the flag protesters off the streets
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned are sick of our roads being blocked by 'Peaceful Flag protesters'.
It is illegal for people to wilfully block the roads, yet the PSNI allow them to night after night. We demand that the police are allowed to do their job and arrest those blocking roads.
Riots occur after these 'Peaceful' Protests so  no further rioting will occur in the event of the criminals being arrested.
